April 09, 2008

It's CSS Naked Day!

Today's the big day! I've turned off my style sheets in honor of CSS naked day! Aside from the sIFR, which I'm not going to disable for this, you are seeing the pure semantic HTML markup of this site. This ties into a series of posts I started earlier this week on semantic HTML. More to come soon

DontTrustThisGuy.com is authored by Jim Jeffers, a twenty-something web consultant currently residing in Phoenix, AZ. You will find random ramblings, discussions on web technologies, user interface design, programming, business, politics, and anything else that crosses his mind here.
